##########
Namespaces
##########

Use :class:`~gitlab.objects.Namespace` objects to manipulate namespaces. The
:attr:`gitlab.Gitlab.namespaces` manager objects provides helper functions.

Examples
========

List namespaces:

.. literalinclude:: namespaces.py
   :start-after: # list
   :end-before: # end list

Search namespaces:

.. literalinclude:: namespaces.py
   :start-after: # search
   :end-before: # end search
